entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
